{'status': 'success', 'plot_path': '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/run-20251210-181613-r001/oldest_painting_per_movement.png', 'note': 'Plot created successfully!:
```python

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import os

# Data
movements = ["Renaissance", "neoclassicism"]
years = [1438, 1764]
display_labels = ["Renaissance (1438)", "neoclassicism (1764)"]

# Create figure and axis
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

# Create bar chart
bars = ax.bar(movements, years, color=['#8B4513', '#4682B4'], alpha=0.7, edgecolor='black', linewidth=1.5)

# Customize the plot
ax.set_xlabel('Art Movement', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_ylabel('Year', fontsize=12, fontweight='bold')
ax.set_title('Year of Oldest Painting per Art Movement', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold', pad=20)

# Add value labels on top of bars
for i, (bar, year) in enumerate(zip(bars, years)):
    height = bar.get_height()
    ax.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width()/2., height,
            f'{int(year)}',
            ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=11, fontweight='bold')

# Add grid for better readability
ax.grid(axis='y', alpha=0.3, linestyle='--')
ax.set_axisbelow(True)

# Adjust layout
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
save_path = '/home/bleon/git/XMODE/ArtWork/experiments/log-batch/anthropic-claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929/run-20251210-181613-r001'
os.makedirs(save_path, exist_ok=True)
file_path = os.path.join(save_path, 'oldest_painting_per_movement.png')
plt.savefig(file_path, dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')

print(f"Plot saved successfully to: {file_path}")
plt.close()

```
